title: IP GIFTING
body: Why am I not able to IP gift a champ in a free to play game? I have RP but would only use that in skins. Riot get your capitalism together.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Shawn138Quartz,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xLf8s2Hj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-23T09:36:07.377+0000)
>
> Mark009 dont comment.

why make a thread if you're just going to tell people not to comment lmao.

and if we could gift with IP, it means riot would get those sweet sweet dollar bills.
**Because riot like money.** I don't blame em who doesn't! **Sounds like a great idea** but I don't think riot would do it solely because they lose money from this idea. ^_^
100%, I blame Rito and Tony Abbott for this
